name: Super International Cricket
overview: From the crack of the cricket bat to cheering crowds, this game has it all - even seagulls! Batting and bowling so realistic, you'd swear you had been selected yourself. Super International Cricket features full team selection and field positioning, a huge variety of batting and bowling styles, and a wide variety of play options. Realistic broadcast-style perspective! Digitized player animations. Intuitive batting and bowling gives player full control Stumpcam! Fully customized team and field. Play as any of 8 international teams! One-Day, World Series and Test Match play. Exciting two player action!
